nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.tiles

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.tiles.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Door, Free, Wall

    public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
implements Interactable
    A tile of the board. Tiles can either be free, not free, or swap between the two. Tiles are connected to their neighbors. In order to be able to make instances of implementations of this implementations must have either a zero argument constructor or a public static build(TileInfo) method.
